common.description: Show your code. Inspire the world.

home.communityDrivenDesc: Join thousands of developers sharing knowledge and best practices.
home.title: Anvel - Share Code & Inspire Developers
home.pageDescription: Discover, share, and collaborate on code snippets with developers worldwide. Read technical articles, get AI-powered code analysis, and grow your skills in a vibrant developer community.
home.heroDescription: Join thousands of developers sharing knowledge through code snippets and technical articles. Get instant AI-powered complexity analysis, collaborate with peers, and build something amazing together.
home.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features designed to help you share code, learn faster, and connect with a global community of developers
home.codeSnippetsDesc: Share and discover code snippets with syntax highlighting, version control, and AI-powered complexity analysis. Organize with tags and collections.
home.personalBlogDesc: Read in-depth technical articles, tutorials, and case studies from experienced developers. Learn best practices and real-world solutions.
home.communityDesc: Connect with thousands of passionate developers worldwide. Share knowledge, get feedback, and grow together through collaboration.
home.instantAnalysisDesc: Get automatic time and space complexity analysis for your code. Receive intelligent suggestions to optimize your algorithms instantly.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Getting started is simple - create, share, and grow in three easy steps
home.step1Desc: Sign up for free in seconds. Set up your developer profile, customize your preferences, and join our growing community of coders.
home.step2Desc: Post code snippets with syntax highlighting, write technical articles, and organize content with tags. Make your knowledge accessible to developers worldwide.
home.step3Desc: Connect with other developers, receive feedback on your code, discover new solutions, and level up your programming skills through collaboration.
home.testimonialQuote: Anvel has completely changed how I share and discover code. The AI analysis is incredibly helpful, and the community is supportive and knowledgeable. It's become my daily go-to platform for learning and collaboration.
home.ctaDescription: Join our community of passionate developers today. Share your knowledge, learn from others, and grow your skills. It's completely free to get started.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Anvel
newsletter.description: Get the latest code snippets, technical articles, developer tips, and community highlights delivered to your inbox every week

newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime. No spam, ever.

about.title: About Anvel - Developer Community Platform
about.pageDescription: Learn about Anvel, the platform built by developers for developers to share code and knowledge.
about.heroSubtitle: Built by developers, for developers. A platform to share code, learn from others, and grow together.
about.storySubtitle: Born from a passion for coding and sharing knowledge
about.storyP1: Anvel started as a simple idea: create a place where developers can easily share code snippets and learn from each other. As a developer myself, I often found it challenging to organize and share my code snippets across different projects and teams.
about.storyP2: What began as a personal tool for managing code snippets evolved into a full-featured platform that combines snippet sharing with technical blogging. The goal is to provide a space where developers can not only share quick code solutions but also write in-depth articles about their experiences.
about.storyP3: Today, Anvel serves thousands of developers worldwide, helping them document their journey, share knowledge, and build meaningful connections in the tech community.
about.missionDesc: To empower developers by providing a platform to share knowledge, collaborate, and grow together through code and content.
about.visionDesc: To become the go-to platform where developers find inspiration, share solutions, and build a supportive global community.
about.valuesDesc: Open collaboration, continuous learning, quality content, and deep respect for the developer community.
about.creatorBio: A passionate developer with experience in building modern web applications. I believe in the power of sharing knowledge and building tools that make developers' lives easier and more productive.
about.techSubtitle: Anvel is built using cutting-edge technologies to ensure the best performance, security, and user experience
about.ctaSubtitle: Start sharing your code snippets and contributing to the developer community today

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Anvel
privacy.pageDescription: Learn how Anvel collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.heroSubtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacy.infoCollectDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.infoItem3: Code snippets and blog posts you create
privacy.infoItem4: Comments and interactions with other users
privacy.howUseDesc: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.useItem1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.useItem2: Process your transactions and send related information
privacy.useItem3: Send you technical notices and support messages
privacy.useItem4: Respond to your comments and questions
privacy.useItem5: Monitor and analyze trends and activities
privacy.sharingDesc: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your information only:
privacy.securityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.rightItem1: Access and receive a copy of your data
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy:

terms.title: Terms of Service - Anvel
terms.pageDescription: Terms and conditions for using Anvel platform.
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using Anvel, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.serviceDesc: Anvel provides a platform for developers to share code snippets and read technical blog posts.
terms.accountDesc: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to:
terms.contentDesc: You retain rights to your content. By posting, you grant Anvel a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use and distribute your content.
terms.moderationDesc: We reserve the right to remove content that violates these terms or suspend accounts that repeatedly violate policies.
terms.disclaimerDesc: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. We do not warrant uninterrupted or error-free service.

cookie.whatDesc: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites work efficiently and provide information to owners.
cookie.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function:
cookie.analyticsDesc: These help us understand visitor behavior:

analyzeComplexity.o1: Constant time - operations execute in the same amount of time regardless of input size
analyzeComplexity.oLogN: Logarithmic time - typically involves dividing the problem in half each time (like binary search)
analyzeComplexity.oN: Linear time - execution time grows linearly with input size (single loop)
analyzeComplexity.oNLogN: Linearithmic time - common in efficient sorting algorithms (merge sort, quick sort)
analyzeComplexity.oN2: Quadratic time - typically involves nested loops
analyzeComplexity.oN3: Cubic time - typically involves triple nested loops
analyzeComplexity.o2N: Exponential time - execution time doubles with each addition to input (recursive algorithms)
analyzeComplexity.note: This is a basic estimation. For accurate analysis, consider the specific algorithm and data structures used.
